 I've already read the rules. The problem is that with what I 
concider the major rules to remember it's hard to remember the minor 
ones like posting when you leave. On another rpg I wrote for my first 
entree that I had barely survived 2 years on the planet Nagas. By the 
way I'll go read over them,but I'm pretty sure there are no rule 
against naming other players characters, naming a new element(I'll do 
that later), or declaring that the moon is really a giant robot that 
I may later use as a base(I just want to know if you can list it on 
the map).

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:

only
